name: Dungeon Chess - Putting Chess Into The Dungeon
blurb: Dungeon Chess is what happens when tech. meets a board game based on the idea of Chess Meets Dungeon Characters - Infinite strategic possibilities!

rewards.reward: \tA special thank you note from Teo and the Dungeon Chess team, plus access to our Insiders Club where you can get first access to new versions of the game before they are released. You can also initiate and vote on new features for the game and will get regular updates on our progress! Finally, certain features of the game will be available only to backers! (That's a lot for $5, eh!)

All of the above, plus get access to a custom profile manager on the website, a listing in our Players Club, and exclusive invitations to vote in our final decision process for prioritizing development of new and next game features! Nice.

All of the above, plus MP3 files of our current Theme Song plus 20 of Teo's other Fusion Hacker and Music for Film and Television sets of recordings on a data CD, which you can use as ring tones. Wow!
All of the above, plus your name listed on the game site Sponsors and Backers page, linked to your website or favorite social media profile, like FaceBook! This is a great way to make new friends!
All of the above, plus a copy of Teo's upcoming book on ancient strategy games and how these contributed to our civilization. If you love history and board games, this is a must have!
All of the above, plus a small display ad on our Sponsors page! This is great for artists and businesses looking for additional advertising.
All of the above, except a large display ad (instead of a small one) on our Sponsors page! Teo will also provide a copy of his book on Social Media and how to use it to grow your business.

Get all of the above, plus a powerful social bookmarking site of your very own that ties into over 12,000 articles in the ArticleAdvocates.com blogging system, allows you and your friends to add articles about your passion, provides article syndication automatically to other websites in our systems, allows readers to participate and collect articles onto their own "bookmarker" pages, and provides powerful search engine optimization and pointers to your other websites! See http://NewAquaponics.com and http://MyBlogBrand.com for examples of what your social bookmarking site could look like!  (This includes domain name registration and website hosting for one year!)

All of the above, plus your face available as one of the characters in the game with custom movement type! Forget playing and molding the game for a minute and imagine actually being a part of the game! Really cool!
